calculations.name: WATM(d) X
calculations.tableau_expression: SUM([Initial Cash USD X]*[DTM])/SUM([Initial Cash USD X])

calculation_context.Expression: SUM([Initial Cash USD X]*[DTM])/SUM([Initial Cash USD X])

calculated_fields.Initial Cash USD X:
if [Parameters].[Use Custom Date] THEN 

IF [MAX_DATE -1day]= [RpDate] then   [Ut. US MM] ELSE 0 End

ELSEIF [RpDate]=  [Parameters].[Date X (comparison date)] then  [Ut. US MM] else 0 END
calculated_fields.MAX_DATE -1day:
case datepart('weekday',[Max Date])
when 1 then [Max Date]-2
when 2 then [Max Date]-3
else [Max Date]-1
end
calculated_fields.Max Date:
case datepart('weekday',today())
    when 1 then today()-2
    when 2 then today()-3
    else today()-1
    END
